title: Why was UNCW Police Personnel Patrolling  US 132 between Deerfield Road and Castle Hayne Road on Tuesday December 8, 2009
text:
Without some details, it's hard to tell. But it is likely they may
have been doing some type of training. The Cape Fear Community College
satellite campus off 132 is where the school runs law enforcement
training courses and it's common to see vehicles from various law
enforcement agencies around the area that have officers participating
in training programs.
